title: Cumulative changes
expected: Hi, I'm Ras! call me John.

title: Paragraph-wide Merging
original:
Ich bin.

Du bist.

Er/sie/es ist.
mine:
Ich bin.

Du 1 bist.

Er/sie/es ist.
theirs:
Ich 2 bin.

Du bist.

Er/sie/es 3 ist.
expected:
Ich 2 bin.

Du 1 bist.

Er/sie/es 3 ist.

title: jbuddha-example
original:
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
How I what you are
Up the world so high
Like a diamond in the sky
mine:
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
How I what you are
Up above the world so high
Like a diamond in the sky
theirs:
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
How I wonder what you are
Up the world so high
Like a diamond in the sky
expected:
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
How I wonder what you are
Up above the world so high
Like a diamond in the sky

title: Levenshtein-Test
mine: One thre four five six seven.
theirs: One two tree four five seven.
expected: One two three four five six seven.
